argumentText:
ARGUMENT
i j m

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | dmatbas.a | |- A = ( N Mat R ) |
| 2 |  | dmatbas.b | |- B = ( Base ` A ) |
| 3 |  | dmatbas.0 | |- .0. = ( 0g ` R ) |
| 4 |  | dmatbas.d | |- D = ( N DMat R ) |
| 5 | 1, 2, 3, 4 | #P_dmatval | |- ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. V ) -> D = { m e. B | A. i e. N A. j e. N ( i =/= j -> ( i m j ) = .0. ) } ) |
| 6 |  | #P_elex | |- ( R e. V -> R e. _V ) |
| 7 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( N DMatALT R ) = ( N DMatALT R ) |
| 8 | 1, 2, 3, 7 | #P_dmatALTbas | |- ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. _V ) -> ( Base ` ( N DMatALT R ) ) = { m e. B | A. i e. N A. j e. N ( i =/= j -> ( i m j ) = .0. ) } ) |
| 9 | 6, 8 | #P_sylan2 | |- ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. V ) -> ( Base ` ( N DMatALT R ) ) = { m e. B | A. i e. N A. j e. N ( i =/= j -> ( i m j ) = .0. ) } ) |
| 10 | 5, 9 | #P_eqtr4d | |- ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. V ) -> D = ( Base ` ( N DMatALT R ) ) ) |
